headline: Affera™ momentum continues as Medtronic announces CE Mark in Europe and U.S. IDE first cases for Sphere-360™ PFA catheter to treat paroxysmal atrial fibrillation
summary: Medtronic plc (NYSE:MDT), a global leader in healthcare technology, today announced two major milestones for the Affera™ Sphere-360™ catheter, a first-of-its-kind, all-in-one mapping and single-shot pulsed field ablation (PFA) catheter for treatment of paroxysmal atrial fibrillation (AFib): CE Mark in Europe and the completion of first cases in the Horizon 360 IDE pivotal trial in the United States.

content.title: Affera™ momentum continues as Medtronic announces CE Mark in Europe and U.S. IDE first cases for Sphere-360™ PFA catheter to treat paroxysmal atrial fibrillation
